mapper.select: select r.no, r.title, u.name, r.content, r.hit, to_char(r.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') reg_date, r.user_no, r.group_no, r.order_no, r.depth from rboard r , users u where r.user_no = u.no order by r.group_no desc, r.order_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into rboard values (seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{user_no}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, seq_rboard_no.nextval, 1, 0)
mapper.select: select r.no, r.title, u.name, r.content, r.hit, to_char(r.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') "reg_date", r.user_no from rboard r , users u where r.user_no = u.no and r.no = #{no}
